content: I just wanted to see if this group using FHIR for medical guideline? The guideline we create are created for physician so I am not sure if FHIR is the correct format for us.
More specifically, I think you're asking if anyone else is using PlanDefinition to represent medical guidelines?

The CDS WG is balloting an implementation guide this cycle that is focusing on guideline recommendations, based on experience gained from various groups that have been doing this with FHIR for different guidelines: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/cqf-recommendations/index.html
@Lloyd McKenzie @Bryn Rhodes How would go about getting involved in this discussion or what this would entail?
Hi @Tom MCDEVITT , there is a project page here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CDS/CPGonFHIR

We hold weekly calls to discuss the content and examples, and we'll be exercising some of the example content at the upcoming connectathon. Lots of ways to participate, you're very welcome to join the calls!
